rukus.text: 99|1|nowpel del phendei trauv ban ke thveu aoy ronhchuoy yeang khlangokla .
99|2|haey phendei ban b po  ch nh nouv sakasap teangoasa del mean  nowknong khluon robsa vea  .
99|3|haey mnoussa lok ka niyeay tha  tae mean rueng avei kaet  laeng champoh phendei nih
99|4|now thngai noh  vea nung brakeasabrab nouv ruengreav robsa vea
99|5|piproh mcheasa robsa anak ban banhchea aoy vea thveu dauchnaoh .
99|6|now thngai noh der  mnoussa lok nung chenhpi phnaur mk teang krom  khosa  knea daembi ttuol kar bangheanh aoy kheunh nouv ampeu teanglay robsa  puokke .
99|7|dau che  neah  anak del thveu ampeula saumbi mean tomngon bon lomangthouli  ka ke nung kheunh vea der .
99|8|chamnek e anak del thveuampeu akrak  saumbi mean tomngon bon  lomangthouli ka ke nung meulkheunh vea der .
